Name: Sound Therapy, Relaxation Exercises, and Hearing Test: Beltone Tinnitus Calmer
Summary: Offers sound therapy, relaxation exercises, and a hearing test for managing tinnitus symptoms.

Name: Tinnitus Masking: Tinnitus Therapy Lite
Summary: Designed to mask the symptoms of tinnitus by providing various sounds and noise types.

Name: Learn and Practice Cognitive Behavioral Therapy: CBT Companion
Summary: Focuses on cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) techniques to help individuals manage mental health.

Name: Hearing Protection and dB Meter: iOS: NIOSH Sound Level Meter
Summary: Measures sound levels in the environment and provides alerts for potential hearing damage.

Name: HearAngel
Summary: Measures sound levels in the environment and provides alerts for potential hearing damage.

Name: Hearing Enhancement and Hearing Test: Petralex Hearing Aid (Lite)
Summary: Serves as a hearing aid by enhancing sound for individuals with hearing impairments.
